sentence.Network_en: A fellow doesn't last long on what he has done. He's got to keep on delivering as he goes along.--Carl Hubbell, Baseball Player
sentence.Network_cn: 靠过去完成的无法让人保有成功，必须在路上持续交出成绩。

sentence.Network_en: The road to peace will be long and drawn-out.
sentence.Network_cn: 通往和平的道路将很漫长。

sentence.Network_en: It was five long miles to the nearest pub.
sentence.Network_cn: 离最近的酒吧有长长的5英里的路程。

list.abs: Charity suffered long and is kind ;, 爱是经久忍耐 , 亲切友爱;
Love suffers long and is kind ;, 爱是恒久忍耐中恩慈;
there , long suffering men and women peacefully protested the denial of their rights as Americans .在那个城市，长期身受磨难的男男女女以和平方式抗议其作为美国公民的权利遭到剥夺。
in Iraq , we are helping the long suffering people of that country to build a decent and democratic society at of the Middle East .在伊拉克，我们正在帮助长期饱受苦难的伊拉克人民在中东腹地建立一个公正的民主社会。
Crowded Haiti has long suffered from squabbling and venal politicians , extreme inequality and ecological stress ., 臃肿的海地长期经受着聒噪和惟利是图的政客 , 极度的不公正 , 生态压力所困扰.

means.word_mean: 1. patient endurance of pain or unhappiness

auth_sentence.content: It has a long coastline on the Indian Ocean.
auth_sentence.res_content: It has a long coastline on the Indian Ocean.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It has a long coastline on the Indian Ocean.

auth_sentence.content: This is why all apes have a long childhood.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is why all apes have a long childhood.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is why all apes have a long childhood.

auth_sentence.content: They are long-lived organisms, so they adapt slowly.
auth_sentence.res_content: They are long-lived organisms, so they adapt slowly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They are long-lived organisms, so they adapt slowly.
